p: Can you not ask the Countess for the best agents in Chicago for Daddy?

Tell her he has been lecturing all over the Middle West and South lately, and would like a local agent in Chicago now. She must have heard of such agents through her husband, and you are not asking any favor. The Cycle of the West is important Americana.
We would so like a chance to have Hilda with us in Chicago - Do what you can -
